circumstances: The crew was engaged in a check of the Lubbock Airport facilities. During the takeoff roll, the airplane became uncontrollable, veered off runway and came to rest with its undercarriage raised. All three crew members were uninjured while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
The crew failed to maintain directional control and failed to obtain/maintain flying speed. The following factors were reported: 
- Improper level off, 
- The aircraft veered with different engine power, 
- The tailwheel was not locked.
